hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:None of us had more than a single garment and we used to have our menses while wearing it. Whenever it got soiled with blood of menses we used to apply saliva to the blood spot and rub off the blood with our nails

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ تُصَلِّي الْمَرْأَةُ فِي ثَوْبٍ حَاضَتْ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Can a woman offer her Salat (prayers) in the clothes in which she has her menses?
